LanguageData.GDIResearch.label: GDI
LanguageData.GDIResearch.description: Join the Global Defense Initiative.And become the enemy of the Brotherhood.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Buildings.label: GDI Structures
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Buildings.description: Get access to GDI structures. Unlocks basic structures and production facilities.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Technology.label: GDI Intel
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Technology.description: Get access to information only known by GDI commanders. Necessary for basic technologies.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedTechnology.label: Classified Information
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedTechnology.descripti: Get access to classified information only known by high ranking personell. Necessary for advanced technologies.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_SonicTechnology.label: Sonic Breakthrough
LanguageData.GDIResearch_SonicTechnology.description: GDI has developed new means in fighting Tiberium. These new weaponized sonic technologies can be used in warfare aswell. Unlocks the advanced sonic inhibitor, mobile sonic shatterer weapon and sonic emitter security stucture.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Security.label: Defensive Structures
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Security.description: Get access to basic GDI security structures. Unlocks the Watchtower.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedSecurity.label: Advanced GDI Security
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedSecurity.description: Get access to advanced GDI security structures. Unlocks sonic weaponry.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Production.label: GDI Armory I
LanguageData.GDIResearch_Production.description: Get access to GDI's Armory and protect the world. Unlocks small firearms and armor suits.
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedProduction.label: GDI Armory II
LanguageData.GDIResearch_AdvancedProduction.descripti: Get access to GDI's advanced and experimental weapons. Unlocks the Zone Trooper armor and railgun.
